name: Puzzlebeams
description:
Use your arrow keys to turn on all lasers pointing in the direction you press. Send all objects into their portals to complete the level. Things will get tricky, though! Deal with bouncing lasers, moving platforms, and destructible blocks as you solve the puzzle bit by bit.

Be nimble, yet careful, as you make your way through an increasingly difficult set of 40 levels. The first 10 levels will help you learn the basics of the game.
